skins.shipDescription: Leipzig-class light cruiser, Leipzig. Can be built after unlocking
skins.selfIntroduction: Um... I'm... Leipzig, the first ship of the Leipzig-class... One time, I collided with Eugen because of some thick fog... I hope she doesn't still hate me...
skins.acquisition: Co- Commander... I'm Leipzig. I black out frequently due to malnutrition, but... I'll do my best to finish the tasks assigned to me...
skins.login: Wel... welcome back, Commander. I've arranged your documents...
skins.details: C-commander... Please don't stare at me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Eek! I think I saw something...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander... is there anything else I can help with?
skins.secretaryTouch: Is this training for learning how to not faint? I'll.. see what I can do...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uuu... I really won't be able to move like this... what should I do?

skins.shipDescription: I feel like Fishy is a lot more capable than before, but I don't feel much different... M-maybe Fishy was the one to get a retrofit instead of me?!
skins.acquisition: I feel like Fishy is a lot more capable than before, but I don't feel much different... M-maybe Fishy was the one to get a retrofit instead of me?!
skins.login: Phew... Commander, I, I organized your files!
skins.details: Fishy looks a bit intimidating, but he's really kind! ... Well... I might be the only one he's kind to... Sorry...
skins.secretaryIdle1: You're right, a nutritious diet is important... Do you have any... um, yummy recommendations...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Despite how Fishy looks, he really does have his own thoughts and feelings. But it seems I'm the only person who understands what he says...
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's okay, Fishy. Commander is just a little busy right now...
skins.secretaryTouch: Unghh... Get a grip, me! I can't faint now...!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! I-I managed to not faint...! Thank you, Commander!
